index.html:
<body>
  <script>
    // Add your code below this line
    const scale = d3.scaleLinear();
    scale.domain([250, 500]);
    scale.range([10, 150]);
    
    // Add your code above this line
    const output = scale(50);
    d3.select("body")
      .append("h2")
      .text(output);
  </script>
</body>
